getSourceFile

Returns the source file descriptor

Returns:
Source file

getDestFile

public File getDestFile()
Returns the destination file descriptor. Destination file should be in the same directory as the source file, and have the same name, except for the extension: while source file has an extension .unsorted, destination file has the extension .sorted. Hint: use File class's constructor that receives two arguments and methods getParentFile(), getName().

Returns:
Destination file
